DescriptionTemplates: A {Adjective} loading dock opens before you. {Detail}. Massive cargo doors, sealed shut for centuries, loom at the far end.
This {Adjective} freight bay once bustled with activity. {Detail}. Now only echoes remain.
You emerge onto a {Adjective} cargo platform. {Detail}. The scale of this place is staggering.
Details: Empty cargo containers are stacked haphazardly along the walls
A defunct loading crane hangs motionless overhead, its cables frayed
Runic identification markers still glow faintly on the floor
Pools of iridescent fluid collect in the low points of the deck
The skeletal frame of a cargo servitor lies collapsed against one wall
